name: Humanity's Last Stand Against the Killer Robots
name_original: Humanity's Last Stand Against the Killer Robots
description:
Evil killer robots, programmed to destroy anything that moves, have taken over the world! Only after all the armies on Earth were wiped out did anyone realize that you, a basic construction robot, can build anti-killer robot weaponry that, conveniently, does not move. Now save the world!

This game was created for Bullet Hell Jam 2021. All the assets were made by us, except for the fonts.  There were so many more ideas and levels we wanted to implement, but this is as far as we got in the one week time period. I hope you enjoy the game regardless!
